summary: This bill, the United States Leadership in Immersive Technology Act of 2025, aims to promote the development and use of immersive technologies (augmented reality, virtual reality, and mixed reality) in the US. It establishes an Immersive Technology Advisory Panel to assess the economic impact of these technologies, make recommendations on their use, and study their effects on economic competitiveness and national security. The bill tasks the Secretary of Commerce with designating a principal advisor on immersive technology and providing administrative support to the Advisory Panel. The panel will also consider issues like collaboration between government and the private sector, cybersecurity, privacy, and international leadership.
